gw.api.domain.invoice

Interface InvoicePayer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InvoiceStreamInvoicingSettingsProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Account, Producer

    public interface InvoicePayer
extends InvoiceStreamInvoicingSettingsProvider
    An InvoicePayer is responsible for paying invoices.

        Returns:
        the bundle of the payer

      • getAllInvoicesBetween

        java.util.List<Invoice> getAllInvoicesBetween(Invoice start,
                                            Invoice stop)
        Return a sublist of the invoices sorted by event date between the start(exclusive) and stop invoices(exclusive).
        Parameters:
        start - the first invoice
        stop - the last invoice
        Returns:
        a list of invoices in between (and exclusive of) the start and stop invoices
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on bad input

      • isOnCycle

        boolean isOnCycle()
        Currently this will return true for AgencyBill as it is always on a cycle, and false for Direct Bill as we do not support cycles for direct bill.
        Returns:
        true if the Invoice payer is on a cycle and may only have invoices added on cycle dates.

      • findReceivedPaymentMoneysSortedByReceivedDate

        StandardQueryBeanResultWithSummary<? extends PaymentMoneyReceived> findReceivedPaymentMoneysSortedByReceivedDate()
        Finds all the Payment Monies that have been received against this Invoice Payer, sorted by Received Date
        Returns:
        Payment money receiveds sorted by the received date.

      • getNextPlannedInvoice

        Invoice getNextPlannedInvoice()
        Returns:
        the invoice payer's next planned invoice, or null is there isn't one.

      • getInvoiceStreams

        InvoiceStream[] getInvoiceStreams()
        Returns:
        the invoice streams associated with the invoice payer

      • isPolicyLevelBilling

        @Deprecated
boolean isPolicyLevelBilling()
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) Use isPolicyLevelBillingWithDefaultUnapplied() instead
        Returns:
        whether the payer is using policy level billing with default unapplied

      • getInvoicingLeadTime

        int getInvoicingLeadTime()
        Returns the number of days between the invoicing send (bill) date and the invoice due date for the payer's default PaymentInstrument. To get the lead time for a specific payment instrument use InvoiceStreamInvoicingSettingsProvider.getInvoicingLeadTime(gw.bc.payment.entity.PaymentInstrument)
        Returns:
        lead time in days

      • getPaymentInstruments

        java.util.List<PaymentInstrument> getPaymentInstruments()
        Returns the list of all PaymentInstruments usable by this InvoicePayer
        Returns:
        paymentInstruments

      • getCurrency

        Currency getCurrency()
        Returns:
        The currency of the payer

      • removeEmptyInvoiceStream

        void removeEmptyInvoiceStream(InvoiceStream invoiceStream)
        Removes an empty InvoiceStream from this InvoicePayer
        Parameters:
        invoiceStream - empty invoice stream to remove
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if invoiceStream contains any Invoices

      • getUnappliedTAccount

        TAccount getUnappliedTAccount()
        Get the t-account as defined by the unapplied t-account pattern. Note: This does not include any t-accounts as defined by the designated unapplied t-account pattern
        Returns:
        unapplied tAccount
